item.title: Trump's 'Gold Card' relies on legal loophole to help wealthy foreigners get U.S. visa
item.description: In exchange for $1 million and a $15,000 processing fee, "Gold Card" applicants will get full-time residency in the U.S., the program's website says.

item.title: Art Basel Miami sees strong attendance and sales as art market recovers
item.description: More than 80,000 collectors and art fans poured into Art Basel Miami Beach, with several works selling for over $1 million.
